summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Police Department; authorizing execution of grant agreements with the United States Department of Justice and the Corporation for National Service for continued financial assistance for the AmeriCorps Neighborhood Revitalization Program; accepting the money when received; increasing the 1997 Budget of the Police Department; ratifying and confirming prior acts; and making a reimbursable appropriation therefor, all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
